comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Showing covered gangway and men assembled on deck to greet dignitaries during May, 1915 Atlantic Fleet and Naval Review in New York City. See The Wyoming, flagship of the Atlantic Fleet, anchored off 82d Street in the Hudson River on May 8, 1915 at the start of a 10 day series of activities including a Presidential review of the fleet. The details, including primary sources, are covered in an excellent web page devoted to these events, at www.brighteningglance.org/fleet-week-may-1915.html.
